branding.tagline: Rise from the ashes with fantasy

publishing_focus.primary_focus: Epic fantasy revolving around themes of resurrection and renewal
publishing_focus.target_audience: Readers drawn to stories of transformation and second chances
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Our focus on themes of rebirth sets us apart in the market
publishing_focus.example_titles: Comparable to works by J.K. Rowling or Brent Weeks
